text: (napiye!) Itai nir poyyakak karpanai ceytu kontir enru ivarkal kurukinranara? (Avvarayin, napiye!) Kuruviraka: â€˜â€˜Itai nan poyyakak karpanai ceytukontal (atarkaka) allah (ennait tantikka mattana? Annerattil allah)vukku etiritaiyaka ninkal enakku etuvum (utavi) ceyya caktiyarravarkal (tane!) Itaip parri (enakku virotamaka) ninkal ennenna kurukirirkalo, avarrai avan nankarintumirukkiran. Akave, enakkum unkalukkum mattiyil avane potumana catciyaka irukkiran. Avantan mika mannippavan, maka karunaiyutaiyavan avan
